pullRequest.title: Add 32 most significant bits of gid key to key in btree mapping from

commit.message:
Add 32 most significant bits of gid key to key in btree mapping from
gid to lid in document meta store to reduce amount of CPU cache misses
during lookup.

nodes.bodyText: I assume these should just be inlined and noexcept.
Consider updating the comment to reflect the new key type.
